seo.title: shopmakers | your shopify experts
seo.description: We craft profitable, high-quality, scalable and performant solutions based on Shopify

hero.title: Boost your business with a first class ecommerce
hero.subtitle: We craft profitable, high-quality, scalable and performant solutions based on Shopify
hero.illustration-alt: Two people shopping on a beautiful Shopify based ecommerce.

0.title: Because we have experience
0.content: Our professional team is talented and able to respond to your needs. We specialise in Shopify: a flexible and efficient solution for your business.

1.title: Because we care
1.content: Your goals are at the centre of our work. Every client is unique and our response is customised. We offer you a holistic view of the complexity of your market.

2.title: Because you won't be alone
2.content: We like to build relationships based on listening. We are communicative, helpful, efficient and organised. We love creating opportunities to meet.

3.title: Because we can help you
3.content: You will have more time and energy to focus on your priorities. You will be able to focus on the growth of your company without having to solve the most complex technical issues.

4.title: Because you can trust us
4.content: We keep our promises. We are punctual, transparent and consistent in our commitment. Our focus is customer-centred. This allows us to offer a high-quality service.

our-services.title: Our Services

0.title: User Experience
0.content: We use UX Research and User Interface Design to provide your customers with an outstanding shopping experience, paying special attention to performance and accessibility.

1.title: Development
1.content: Our experience with the latest web technologies allow us to create blazing fast headless themes and customised apps. We care a lot about code quality, standards and performances.

2.title: Integrations
2.content: We connect your shop with your business tools. No matter which system you currently use, we can integrate your Shopify website with any CRM, ERP, PIM, payment gateway or any other third party service.

3.title: Media Contents
3.content: We present your products and services in the most attractive way. We specialise in creating stunning product images, awesome high-quality videos and AR experiences that will enchant your customers.

our-services.illustration-alt: A person running out of a mobile device with cart full of great products.

why-shopify.title: Why Shopify

0.title: Secure & Reliable
0.content: Shopify takes security seriously. It implements strong access measures, protects cardholder data and maintains a vulnerability management program. All stores powered by Shopify are Level 1 PCI DSS compliant.

1.title: Affordable
1.content: Shopify offers several plans and price options to choose from. Compared to self-hosted shops, it has an incredible price-to-quality ratio. Even the cheapest plan includes essential features and the App Store includes thousands of free apps.

2.title: Performant & Scalable
2.content: Shopify can equip your site to easily handle high traffic volumes and sales spikes. Shopify cloud-based infrastructure is designed for resiliency, with servers capable of handling thousands of transactions per minute. The result is 99.99% uptime.

why-shopify.illustration-alt: An user managing with ease a well developed ecommerce.
